{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-20T23:10:21.000Z", "description": "

Who is Equifax?\u00a0

At Equifax, we believe knowledge drives progress. As a global data, analytics and technology company, we play an essential role in the global economy by helping employers, employees, financial institutions and government agencies make critical decisions with greater confidence.\u00a0

\u00a0

We work to help create seamless and positive experiences during life\u2019s pivotal moments: applying for jobs or a mortgage, financing an education or buying a car. Our impact is real and to accomplish our goals we focus on nurturing our people for career advancement and their learning and development, supporting our next generation of leaders, maintaining an inclusive and diverse work environment, and regularly engaging and recognizing our employees. Regardless of location or role, the individual and collective work of our employees makes a difference and we are looking for talented team players to join us as we help people live their financial best.

\u00a0

The Perks of being an Equifax Employee?

  • We offer excellent compensation packages with market competitive pay, comprehensive healthcare packages, 401k matching, schedule flexibility, work from home opportunities, paid time off, and organizational growth potential.

  • Grow at your own pace through online courses at Learning @ Equifax.

\u00a0

What You\u2019ll Do

  • You will design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve software

  • You will manage individual project priorities, deadlines and work you're doing

  • Design and Develop highly scalable, always-on , secure and resilient cloud native applications in GCP using Java\u00a0

\u00a0

Qualification\u00a0

  • Master's or Bachelor\u2019s degree in required

  • Skills include object-oriented analysis, design, and programming experience

  • 5 +experience with Java / J2EE design and development experience, Spring Framework, Spring Boot, Microservices, Response UI Frameworks like Angular 8

  • Has some knowledge of modern software development life cycles including CI / CD, Source code control management systems (e.g. SVN/Git, Subversion) and build tools like Maven, Design patterns, Agile environments (e.g. Scrum, XP)

\u00a0

\u00a0Extra Points for any of the Following

  • Experience in Cloud services is preferred. Working knowledge in Google Cloud Platform is desirable

  • Experience with developing for Linux environments

  • Experience working in an agile environment

\u00a0

Success Attributes of an Equifax employee; does this describe you?

  • Accountability

  • Bravery

  • Curiosity

  • Collaboration

  • Think and act differently

  • Trust

  • Ownership

  • Decide-Execute-Ship

\u00a0

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

\u00a0\u00a0\u00a0\u00a0

If this sounds like somewhere you want to work, don\u2019t delay, apply today - we\u2019re looking for you!


Primary Location:

USA-Atlanta JV White

Function - Tech Dev and Client Services
